title: Has technology advancement sped up? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, because technology is cumulative. That is, one technological break-through, like the wheel, leads to multiple other advancements. I would recommend an excellent book, The Nature of Technology:What It Is and How It Evolves by W. Brian Arthur (FreePress, 2009). Very well written and concise, only 216 pages text plus plenty of notes.
